entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 03:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
